text:
An example of third-party DSO module installation in the documentation page 
found at http://httpd.apache.org/docs-2.0/dso.html lists the following command as 
the one needed to install a compiled DSO module:

$ apxs -i -a -n foo mod_foo.so

I believe it should be:

$ apxs -i -a -n foo mod_foo.la

Cost me an hour of my work type. Argh!
creator: god@ogmc.ru
trawick@apache.org
text: Your fix has been committed and is reflected on the web site now.  Thanks for your report, and thanks for using Apache!
